doc:
John Hamilton (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/John_Hamilton_(actor) 0 For the American actor of 1893 - 1967, see John F. Hamilton.
John Rummel Hamilton (January 16, 1887 – October 15, 1958) was an American actor, who played in many movies and television programs. He is probably remembered best for his role as the blustery newspaper editor Perry White in the 1950s television program Adventures of Superman. For the_American_actor of 1893 - 1967 , see John_F._Hamilton . John_Rummel_Hamilton_(_January_16_,_1887 – October_15_,_1958_) was an_American_actor , who played in many_movies_and_television_programs . He is_probably_remembered best for his_role as the_blustery_newspaper_editor_Perry_White in the_1950s_television_program_Adventures of Superman .
